brief.title: Brief
brief.description: Work applications should be productive because of their repetitive usage. Compared to the inspiring product, the major flows of the redesigned clock-in app will be simpler.
brief.size: I did UI ideation of the side project on my own and prepared the onboarding document for future members.

why.title: The Problem
why.problem: The company I worked for used an app with clock-in, leave statistics, and salary information. One had to go back to the “Main Menu” as there was another task to do. I wished the flows were more straightforward.

question.title: Question
question.content: How might we simplify the flows of the routine tasks?

items.name: Onboarding
items.description: To work as a remote team, the members who will join the project get started with Onboarding.

items.name: Why & How
items.description: Product specification is subject to change. We write down WHY the defined roles are using a clock-in app and HOW they will fulfill their goals.

flows.title: Flows Comparison
flows.description: “Main Menu” is not required for completing routine tasks. Users who have more than one thing to do will be going back and forth between Main Menu and their goals. The Tab Bar at the screen bottom comes to the flow’s rescue.

prototype.title: Give It a Try
prototype.description: Try the interactions of Pie with the prototype.

items.name: Limited Resources for a Side Project
items.description: There are many tasks to accomplish according to Roles & Goals. The project is moving towards a complete UI flow at the moment due to the short of time & resources.
